change.changenote: Section 4 (part) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 219/2019, effective November 1, 2019.

bcl:section.bcl:text: An authorized society must not do any of the following without first obtaining the consent of the commission:

change.changenote: Section 4 (part) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 208/2021, effective August 1, 2021.

bcl:section.bcl:text: An authorized society must not do any of the following without first obtaining the consent of the Authority:

change.changenote: Section 5 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 219/2019, effective November 1, 2019.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Consent required for restoration of dissolved society
bcl:section.bcl:text: A person must not apply to restore a dissolved society that, before its dissolution, carried on insurance business, without first obtaining the consent of the commission.

change.changenote: Section 5 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 208/2021, effective August 1, 2021.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Consent required for restoration of dissolved society
bcl:section.bcl:text: A person must not apply to restore a dissolved society that, before its dissolution, carried on insurance business, without first obtaining the consent of the Authority.
